FuncDef:
The duration command sets the duration of an generalflow test.
The undo duration command restores the default generalflow test duration.
By default, the duration of a generalflow test is 60s.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the duration of an NQA test.
In a generalflow test instance, the value is an integer ranging from 10 to 172800, in seconds. It indicates the testing time for each packet.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
For generalflow test instances, the duration command sets the duration of an NQA test instance. After the duration time elapses, the NQA test instance automatically stops running.
In a generalflow test, the actual period during which packets are sent is determined by the interval command configuration.
